reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

title.narrative: Caribbean - Palm Pest Complex Technical Working Group

description.narrative: Support the science and practice of food, feed, and fiber production (including forestry, wildlife, fisheries, aquaculture and floriculture) and its relationships to natural resources, processing, marketing, distribution, utilization (including nutrition), and trade.

This award strives to support the science and practice of food, feed, and fiber production (including forestry, wildlife, fisheries, aquaculture and floriculture) and its relationships to natural resources, processing, marketing, distribution, utilization (including nutrition), and trade. In addition, this award APHIS supported and attended the fourth meeting of the Palm Pest Complex Technical Working Group (PPC TWG) May 28-29, 2015. Representatives from ten countries of the Region: Barbados, Cayman Islands, Dominica, Grenada, Jamaica, Martinique, St. Lucia, St. Vincent, Trinidad and Tobago and Turks and Caicos. In addition to APHIS, the Centre for Agricultural Biosciences International (CABI) also attended. The group's objective is to safeguard the Caribbean from the threats and/or impacts of introduction, economic damage and spread of pests of palms through scientific investigation research and the provision of advice on all matters related to pests of palms..
